articles.title: Appeal Adopted at Joint Conference of DPRK
articles.content:
Appeal Adopted at Joint Conference of DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government, political parties and organizations issued an appeal to all Koreans at their joint conference on Wednesday.
					 Saying that this year marks the 45th anniversary of the July 4 Joint Statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 Declaration, the appeal said:
					
					1. Let us positively struggle to implement the line and policy of independent reunification full of ardent patriotism, cherishing the high pride and great honor of being members of Kim Il Sung's nation!
					
					 All Koreans should vigorously pave the road of reunification under the uplifted banner of national independence and great unity!
					
					 Let us resolutely oppose and reject all war drills wrecking peace and stability on the Korean peninsula!
					
					 Let all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad unequivocally support the reunification by federal formula transcending differences in ideology and social system and carry on the positive struggle to realize it!
					
					2. Let us wage a nation-wide struggle to improve the north-south relations and root out the source of acute military conflict between them and danger of a war!
					
					 Let us resolutely smash the anti-DPRK confrontation moves of the south Korean authorities, the main factor of deteriorating the north-south relations and cancer-like entity standing in the way of their improvement!
					
					 Let all Koreans who love peace energetically wage a nation-wide sacred struggle for defusing the military conflict and the danger of a war between the north and the south and building peace mechanism!
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not thoughtlessly take issue with the DPRK's exercise of the right to self-defense but respond to the latter's sincere efforts to prevent the military conflict between the north and the south and ease the tension!
					
					 They should halt at once the reckless arms buildup and anti-north war drills escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula!
					
					3. Let us bring a pan-national grand meeting for reunification to success to usher in a heyday of the nation-wide reunification movement!
					
					 Let all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad achieve solidarity, alliance and unity on the principle of subordinating everything to the country's reunification, the cause common to the nation!
					
					 Let us positively struggle to realize the pan-national grand meeting for reunification to be attended by political parties and organizations including the authorities of the north and the south and compatriots from all walks of life at home and abroad!
					
					4. Let us resolutely frustrate the challenges of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad going against the nation's desire for reunification!
					
					 Let us deal a heavy blow at the U.S. domination and interference aimed to carry out the strategy to dominate Asia-Pacific while keeping south Korea under its occupation forever! 
					
					 Let us hold high the torch of justice and resolutely wipe out the group of traitors who block the road of reunification, leaving the interests of the nation to the tender mercy of outside forces after failing to discern the principal enemy of the nation!
					
					 The U.S. should clearly face up to the inexhaustible might of the DPRK and the trend of the times and make a courageous decision to roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK! 
					
					 It should roll back at once its national estrangement policy aimed to instigate the confrontational maniacs forsaken by the public to perpetuate the division!
					
					 The international community setting store by independence and peace should lift up the voices opposing the U.S. and its vassal forces standing in the way of peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula!
					
					 The DPRK's government, political parties and organizations once again ardently appealed to all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to turn out as one in the sacred struggle to glorify 2017, the year promising great changes, as a significant year of bringing about a new phase of independent reunification in hearty response to the patriotic call of the peerlessly great man.

articles.title: Joint Conference of Government, Political Parties and Organizations of DPRK
articles.content:
Joint Conference of Government, Political Parties and Organizations of DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- A joint conference of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday to carry through the tasks for national reunification set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yong Chol, Ro Tu Chol, the chairman of a friendly party, officials of working people's and public organizations, officials concerned of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Pan-National Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification and other representatives of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK.
					
					 The conference discussed the agenda item "On opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans this year of significance, true to the historic New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Comrade Kim Jong Un".
					
					 Ri Son Gon, chairman of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country of the DPRK, made a report to be followed by speeches by Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the C.C., Korean Social Democratic Party, Jong Yong Nam, first secretary of the C.C., Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, and Kang Ji Yong, chairman of the Religious Believers Council of Korea.
					
					 The reporter and speakers noted that Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address called for opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans this year marking the 45th anniversary of the July 4 Joint Statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 Declaration and indicated overall tasks and ways to put the proposal into practice.
					
					 They fully supported and approved the line and policy of national reunification advanced by the Supreme Leader in his New Year Address as an immortal grand programme for accomplishing the cause of the country's reunification by pooling will and efforts of all Koreans.
					
					 They stressed the need for all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to accelerate the nationwide grand march towards reunification by their united efforts and thus glorify this year as a very significant year in bringing about a new phase of independent reunification. 
					
					 An appeal to all Koreans was adopted at the conference.

articles.title: Angolan President Supports Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Angolan President Supports Korea's Reunification
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Hyon Il, DPRK ambassador to Angola, met Jose Eduardo Dos Santos, president of Angola, on January 12.
					 The Angolan president said Korea's reunification should surely be achieved, hoping that the Korean people will achieve successes in their efforts for peace, stability and reunification of the Korean Peninsula this year under the leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and supporting the struggle of the Korean people.

articles.title: DPRK Permanent Representative's Letter Distributed as UNGA and UNSC Document
articles.content:
DPRK Permanent Representative's Letter Distributed as UNGA and UNSC Document
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- A letter to the UN secretary-general sent by the DPRK permanent representative to prove the absurdity of legal ground for "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK was distributed as the official document A/71/742-S/2017/11 of the UN General Assembly and the UNSC on January 17.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
 Unryul, January 18 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent a centenarian birthday spread to Ri Mo Yol, a woman living in Kumsanpho Workers' District, Unryul County of South Hwanghae Province.
					 Ri was born into a poor peasant's family in Anak County in South Hwanghae Province before Korea's liberation and lived in sorrow as a member of the stateless nation, being subject to all sorts of humiliation and contempt by the exploiting classes.
					
					 She could live a genuine life only after President Kim Il Sung liberated the country.
					
					 She always keeps herself optimistic. She particularly likes sweet potato and vegetable and has balanced diet.

articles.title: Korean Kimchi, Best Health Food
articles.content:
Korean Kimchi, Best Health Food
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Ryugyong Kimchi Factory in the DPRK has turned into a model and icon of the nation's kimchi factories.
					 The factory, the production processes of which have been perfectly automated and streamlined, is producing various kinds of kimchi, including whole cabbage kimchi, sliced cabbage kimchi, nutritious kimchi for children, cucumber kimchi and sliced radish kimchi.
					
					 As a famous national dish, kimchi draws the worldwide attention.
					
					 As regards the five world health foods, a foreign magazine introduced in detail the Korean kimchi. It said that the Korean kimchi was chosen as the five world health foods as it is rich in vitamins A, C, lactic acid bacteria, polysaccharide and lignin.
					
					 ITAR－TASS reported that kimchi is regarded as panacea as it contains rich vitamins.
					
					 Other news agencies noted that kimchi helps prevent various diseases as it contains vitamins, essential amino acid and mineral matters.  
					
					 The 10th Session of the Intergovernmental Committee for the Safeguarding of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of the UNESCO held in Namibia in Juche 104 (2015) adopted a decision on registering Korean nation's custom of making kimchi on the "typical list of intangible cultural heritage of mankind".
					
					 Therefore, kimchi, a pride of the Korean nation, is well known as the best health food in the world for its taste and pharmaceutical value.

articles.title: Ryongaksan Soap Popular among Korean People
articles.content:
Ryongaksan Soap Popular among Korean People
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Ryongaksan Soap Factory was newly built at the foot of scenic Mt. Ryongak in Pyongyang.
					 Shampoo, rinse and other liquid soaps and detergent for vessels produced at the factory are popular among people in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 The factory has intensified the hygienic safety check of its products to ensure their quality in a scientific manner through the analysis of the whole course of production ranging from feeding of raw material to packing.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address stressed the need to bring about a turn in diversifying the range and types of consumer goods and improving their quality. In hearty response to his address, the factory has directed big efforts to developing quality products.  
					
					 Ro Kil Chan, chief engineer of the factory, told KCNA:
					
					 The drive for the renewal of products is progressing apace at the factory. We would hasten the work to round off the products good for preventing the hair from falling out and aging and protecting skin, thus producing more famous products loved by the people.

articles.title: DPRK Intensifies Hygienic and Anti-Epidemic Work
articles.content:
DPRK Intensifies Hygienic and Anti-Epidemic Work
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Big efforts are being directed to the hygienic and anti-epidemic work in the DPRK which regards it as the main duty of the medical science to prevent diseases and promote the health.
					 During the 70-day campaign and the 200-day campaign last year, the country meticulously organized the work to prevent infectious diseases and watch environment and pollution and ensure the hygienic safety of spring water.
					
					 Medical workers of the Pyongyang Medical College Hospital of Kim Il Sung University, the Kim Man Yu Hospital, the Academy of Koryo Medicine, the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, the Okryu Children's Hospital, the Ryugyong Dental Hospital and other national hospitals and provincial people's hospitals conducted hygienic information activities among inhabitants in an effective way.
					
					 Thorough quarantine and medical inspection were made for those entering the DPRK in order to prevent the infection of Zika virus rapidly spread worldwide last year, in particular.
					
					 "Kumsugangsan 3.1", program for monitoring environment, was developed, making it possible to analyze air pollution and assessment of estimation and data on measurement and take necessary measures.
					
					 In hearty response to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address that all the fronts in the sector of culture should effect a new, revolutionary upsurge to accelerate the building of a civilized power, medical workers of the country are fully determined to thoroughly carry out the Workers' Party of Korea's policy on preventive medicine by further intensifying the hygienic and anti-epidemic work this year, too.

articles.title: No One Is Allowed to Take Issue with DPRK's Exercise of Right to Self-defence: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No One Is Allowed to Take Issue with DPRK's Exercise of Right to Self-defence: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The projected test-fire of the inter-continental ballistic rocket by the DPRK will help markedly bolster up its military capability for  self-defence and contribute to peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in  Northeast Asia and, furthermore, in the rest of the world, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The projected test-fire of ICBM by the DPRK is its legitimate exercise of the right to self-defense to cope with the U.S. ever more undisguised nuclear war threat.
					
					 The U.S. has systematically escalated the political, military and economic pressure in a bid to carry out its aggressive strategy for dominating Asia- Pacific, regarding the DPRK as the primary target of its attack and the object to be overthrown.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that the U.S. has resorted to a nuclear blackmail against the DPRK for the last several decades after adopting its nuclear attack on the latter as a policy and using the south Korean puppet forces as a shock brigade for fighting a nuclear war against the latter.
					
					 The DPRK succeeded in the test of first H-bomb, test-fire of various offensive means and nuclear warhead explosion test as an exercise of its right to self-defence to cope with the ever more escalating nuclear war threat of the U.S. and its vassal forces.
					
					 Explicitly speaking once again, the DPRK's development of ICBM is part of measures for bolstering up its self-defensive military capability to cope with the U.S. ever more escalating nuclear war threat and moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the U.S. is groundlessly pulling up the DPRK over its just measures. This is just like a thief crying "stop thief!"
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are getting frantic with the racket of confrontation with the north, dancing to the tune of their American master. The gentries of the puppet Foreign Ministry and Ministry of Unification are crying out for escalating sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK, terming its measures "actions disturbing the world peace and security".
					
					 With no frenzy can the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces ever block the DPRK's exercise of the right to self-defence.
					
					 The DPRK has the legitimate right to steadily bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defense both in quality and quantity in order to defuse the nuclear threat of the warmongers at home and abroad and protect the country's sovereignty and the security of the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Escalating Regional Tension
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Escalating Regional Tension
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- On Jan. 4 the U.S. finished the examination of a plan for building a Colombia-class ballistic missile nuclear submarine to enter its next phase.
					 According to foreign press reports, the first flotilla of nuclear carriers of the U.S. navy headed by nuclear carrier Carl Vinson is sailing to the West Pacific near the South Sea of China and the flotillas of the U.S. nuclear carrier John C. Stennis and Ronald Reagan deployed in South Sea of China and Japan are expected to join it.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday observes that this muscle flexing of the U.S. is aimed to contain China and Russia by further stepping up its policy for military supremacy in the region and make a decisive breakthrough in carrying out its strategy for world domination.
					
					 The commentary goes on: The situation in the Asia-Pacific region is inching close to a war and military conflict every moment owing to the U.S. arms buildup aimed at hegemony.
					
					 This goes to prove that the U.S. is, indeed, the arch criminal escalating tension in the region.
					
					 The DPRK situated in the Asia-Pacific region and in the biggest hotspot in the world, in particular, cannot remain a passive onlooker to the escalating tension in the region.
					
					 If a war breaks out in the region, it may spill over into a world war at a moment and have a very baneful impact upon the security of the Korean nation.
					
					 The DPRK will dynamically advance along the road of bolstering up its self-defense capacity in order to protect the security of the country and nation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts U.S. and S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Operational Scenarios
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts U.S. and S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Operational Scenarios
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Defense Ministry in its "defense ministry's program for 2017" on Jan. 4 announced that it would round off the formation of a special brigade for "removing the war command of the north" within this year. Timed to coincide with this, those concerned of the puppet military disclosed to media the reason why the formation of the brigade was advanced though it was scheduled for 2019, and its scope, strike means and methods.
					 Moreover, they are loudly trumpeting about the projected involvement of special warfare units of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in the operations of the above-said brigade in contingency.
					
					 Commenting on the enemies' operational scenarios, Minju Joson Wednesday observes:  
					
					 The above-said scenarios are the height of undisguised hostile acts against the DPRK as they are imprudent and extremely dangerous actions targeting the supreme headquarters of the DPRK.
					
					 Lurking behind the extremely dangerous scenarios of the puppet group of traitors is a sinister aim to divert the public attention focused on the impeachment of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 The U.S. is obviously behind the formation of the above-said brigade earlier than scheduled.
					
					 The outgoing Obama group have stepped up their moves to hurl the puppet forces into the "beheading operation," an indication of their scenario to avenge the bitter setback in the DPRK-U.S. confrontation.
					
					 The DPRK is fully capable of wiping out to the last man those who seek to do harm to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK wherever on earth they may go into hiding.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Assails Japanese Reactionaries' Revival of Militarism and Moves for Overseas Expansion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Assails Japanese Reactionaries' Revival of Militarism and Moves for Overseas Expansion
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Last year the Japanese reactionaries showed extra zeal for militarization as evidenced by their campaign to instill militarism into Japanese and moves for the revision of the constitution, arms buildup and dispatch of more troops of "Self-Defense Forces" overseas.
					 Incumbent cabinet ministers and ultra-right lawmakers of Japan busied themselves visiting the Yasukuni Shrine individually or in group on spring and autumn festivals and on the occasion of August 15, the day of Japan's defeat. The Japanese chief executive made ritual offerings to the shrine on each important occasion, agitating the visit to the shrine. 
					
					 Commenting on these ridiculous behaviors, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says these are aimed at reviving militarism from A to Z.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Through visits to the shrine the Japanese reactionaries seek to paint their past war of aggression as a "liberation war", war criminals as "heroes" and assailant Japan as "victim" in a bid to stir up revanchism and militarism in the minds of Japanese.
					
					 Last year history textbooks which distorted and beautified Japan's past history and unethical crimes passed the screening, causing serious concern of the international community.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that Japan's military expenditure steadily increased for the past five years.
					
					 What remains to be done by the Japanese reactionaries rushing headlong into militarism is to remove all the legal and institutional means lying in the way of overseas aggression.
					
					 From the outset of the year the Japanese chief executive disclosed several times his sinister intention to revise the present constitution.
					
					 These facts go to prove that the hysteria of the Japanese politicians has gone beyond the red line in the moves to revive militarism and wild dream of overseas expansion.
					
					 The path chosen by Japan leads to self-destruction. The Japanese reactionaries should bear this in mind and stop such hysteria.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Derides Ridiculous Renaming of Party of Non-Park Geun Hye Faction
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Derides Ridiculous Renaming of Party of Non-Park Geun Hye Faction
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces driven into the worst crisis are working with bloodshot eyes to stay in power.
					 The non-Park faction, a breakaway from the Saenuri Party, recently formed a new conservative political party and named it "Parun Party" which means proper party.
					
					 This is nothing but an impudent chicanery to cover up the despicable true colors of the deserters from the Saenuri Party who served traitor Park as her cat's paw and meet their own interests.
					
					 They who conspired with Park in her wrongdoings now put themselves under other mask. This despicable deed of the "pro-reform conservative party" makes the south Koreans shake with anger.
					
					 It was none other than bosses of the non-Park faction who ran wild to help Park win "presidency." 
					
					 After the outbreak of the "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal" they were locked in dirty dog's fight to shift the blame to each other. At the end of it, they created so-called Parun Party.
					
					 This act little short of painting crow white only reveals their intention to deceive the people as much as they please in the future.
					
					 Such guys are heaping praises on Ban who is censured as the second Park Geun Hye in a bid to ensure the conservative forces' stay in power. They are shouting "victory" and bluffing, expecting he would come to their fold for sure.
					
					 What should not be tolerated is that the group of "pro-reform conservative party" is insulting the people with such honey-coated words that "there is expectation of the people for clean politics."
					
					 No matter how often betes noires keen on grabbing power may change their party name through hypocritical farces, the Saenuri Party etched in the minds of the people as the pronoun of crimes can never be written off.
					
					 It is quite natural that the south Korean public is deriding the party as a collection of those seeking their own ambitions and a group of remnants pursuing outdated policies, calling it bean paste-stained party, spit-stained party, cunning party, chameleon party and tricky party.
					
					 It is the unanimous demand of the south Koreans that the worst shame and misfortune should not be allowed to repeat themselves due to the failure to eliminate the descendents of "yusin" and its remnants
					
					 The breakaways from the Saenuri Party had better face justice themselves.
					
					 The renaming of the above-said party is a tragicomedy showing the end of the conservative party.

articles.title: S. Korean Youth and Students Vow to Struggle for Improved North-South Relations
articles.content:
S. Korean Youth and Students Vow to Struggle for Improved North-South Relations
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a meeting in Seoul on Jan. 12 and issued a resolution to turn out in the struggle for improved north-south relations, according to the south Korean online paper Tongil News.
					 The resolution called for totally revising the regime's "policy toward the north" in 2017, the new year in which the people will play a main role, and improving and developing the north-south relations to usher in the era of peace and reunification.
					
					 It expressed the will to make all efforts to realize a pan-national grand meeting for reunification and exchange between youth and students from the north and the south.

articles.title: Nullification of "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Nullification of "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps and the foundation for preserving justice for the settlement of the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in south Korea reportedly made public a statement urging the total nullification of the "agreement" on the sexual slavery issue on Jan. 16.
					 The statement said the truth is being revealed to the effect that the "agreement", made in a rough-and-ready way, was a result of the behind-the-scene manipulation and arbitrary practices of those in power.
					
					 It contended that the "National Assembly" should promptly adopt a resolution declaring the nullification of the "agreement" and renegotiation as demanded by the victims of the sexual slavery and other south Korean people.
					
					 They will continue to fight it out for the nullification of the "agreement" together with the victims of the sexual slavery, the statement said.

articles.title: Deployment of THAAD Opposed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Deployment of THAAD Opposed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- A press conference was reportedly held in Seoul by citizens in Songju and Kimchon, North Kyongsang Province of south Korea on Jan. 16 in protest against the deployment of THAAD by the puppet defense ministry.
					 At the conference speakers denounced the ministry for trying to press for the contract with Lotte on the exchange of site for the deployment of THAAD in January.
					
					 They expressed concern that new military base can come into being without consent of citizens and "National Assembly".
					
					 They demanded that the NA stop the defence ministry's illegal act.
					
					 On the same day, the Songju action committee for the withdrawal of deployment of THAAD and other organizations held a candlelight rally outside the building of the Minju Party, urging the Party to adopt the withdrawal of THAAD deployment plan as its policy.

articles.title: Asia-Pacific Regional Internet Seminar Held
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific Regional Internet Seminar Held
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- An Asia-Pacific regional internet seminar on the subject of "General Kim Jong Un and Korea Today" was held in Pakistan between January 8 and 10 under the joint sponsorship of Asia-Pacific regional and Pakistani national preparatory committees for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu.
					 On display on the front wall of the venue of the seminar were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present there were figures of the international, regional and country-by-country preparatory committees for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu and those of Pakistan, Nepal, Bangladesh, Indonesia, India, New Zealand, Japan, UK, Switzerland and other countries.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portraits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and bowed to them.
					
					 Zabed Ansari, secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association who doubles as co-secretary of the Asia-pacific regional preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, made a keynote report.
					
					 The reporter praised His Excellency Kim Jong Un, perfectly possessed of the idea, leadership and the personality of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the noblest level, for performing great exploits which will take others scores of years at an ordinary pace during such a short time reflecting a moment of history.
					
					 The reporter said that it was the great honor and happiness for not only the Korean people but also the world progressive peoples to hold Kim Jong Un, another great man of Mt. Paektu, in high esteem.
					
					 Introduced at the seminar were congratulatory letters from African, American and Arab regional preparatory committees.
					
					 Rachmawati Soekarnoputri and Peter Woods, co-chairpersons of the international preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, Neil Fitzgerald, co-chairman of the Oceania regional preparatory committee, Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Thai preparatory committee, Raymond Ferguson, national secretary general of the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture, and other figures made speeches.
					
					 Speakers enumerated successes made by the army and people of the DPRK in all fields for five years thanks to another outstanding leader and expressed their stand to be always with the Korean people who are vigorously advancing toward the final victory.
					
					 They called upon the Asia-Pacific regional and country-by-country preparatory committees to take the lead in the work for implementing the appeal of the international preparatory committee on celebrating 2017, a significant year for the Korean people, together with the progressive peoples loving peace and justice.
					
					 An action program of the regional preparatory committee was read out.
					
					 A letter to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants of Asia-Pacific Regional Internet Seminar
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants of Asia-Pacific Regional Internet Seminar
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants of the Asia-Pacific Regional internet seminar "General Kim Jong Un and Korea Today" on January 10.
					 The participants said in the letter that 2017 is an auspicious year marking the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, who performed immortal exploits in achieving the freedom, independence and prosperity of Korea and in accomplishing the cause of global independence. The letter went on:
					
					 The seminar took place when the international activities are being dynamically waged to glorify the year 2017 by praising the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The seminar offered another momentum for highly praising once again the extraordinary leadership of respected HE Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the noble revolutionary careers and exploits, the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the eternal leaders of the Korean people.
					
					 The letter expressed belief that DPRK would certainly turn into a reunified power as wished by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the future, too, while demonstrating the might as a power safeguarding the independent and popular advantageous idea and social system and the global peace and security and representing the justice of the international society.
					
					 We will give wide publicity to the personality of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and more vigorously conduct the international solidarity movement to safeguard the sovereignty and right of the DPRK, the letter noted, adding: We will do their best to hold the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu with a large attendance in the area of Mt. Paektu and Pyongyang in August this year.

articles.title: Action Program Issued by Asia-Pacific Regional Preparatory Committee
articles.content:
Action Program Issued by Asia-Pacific Regional Preparatory Committee
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Asia-Pacific Regional Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu on Jan. 10 made public the following action program to glorify long the personalities and exploits of the great persons of Mt. Paektu and significantly greet the great international festival to be held in August this year. This year will mark the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the fifth anniversary of the election of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to the top posts of the Party and state of the DPRK.
					1. We will hold colorful events praising the great persons of Mt. Paektu in regions and countries to display boundless reverence of the world progressives for them who made undying contributions to achieving global independence.
					
					All the preparatory committees in the Asia-Pacific region significantly started celebration activities this year and they will present valuable gifts, floral baskets, congratulatory messages and letters to the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu in humble reverence for them and hold multifarious events such as meetings, seminars, film shows and lectures on the Day of the Sun, the Day of Shining Star and other occasions.
					
					In particular, we will hold a regional internet seminar on their greatness and undying feats at the highest level in April in which fall the 105th birth anniversary of HE President Kim Il Sung and the 24th anniversary of the election of HE Kim Jong Il as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the fifth anniversary of the election of HE Kim Jong Un to the top posts of the Party and state of the DPRK.
					
					And we will actively conduct writing and publishing of books and literary works praising the ideas, leadership and noble virtues of the great persons of Mt. Paektu and introducing the reality of the DPRK.
					
					2. We will dynamically wage solidarity activities in support of the just cause of the Korean people who are vigorously pushing forward the building of a reunified power true to the line for Korea's reunification set forth by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The Asia-Pacific Regional Preparatory Committee and all preparatory committees in the region will widely introduce the immortal exploits the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu performed for achieving the independent reunification of Korea this year marking the 45th anniversary of the publication of the July 4 joint statement and the 10th anniversary of the adoption of the October 4 declaration.
					
					We will positively conduct activities supporting the just cause of the Korean people for building a reunified prosperous powerful country, upholding the fair an aboveboard line for national reunification put forward by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu despite all challenges and ordeals of history.
					
					The Asia-Pacific Regional Preparatory Committee in close liaison with the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea will make contributions to building the international public opinion about the urgency of Korea's reunification by releasing statements demanding the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea and replacing the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty and ensuring peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the region.
					
					3. We will make contributions to grandly holding the Fifth International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu as a grand international gathering.
					
					The Asia-Pacific Regional Preparatory Committee, country-by-country preparatory committees, organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and individual personages will take an active part in the work for erecting the monument praising the great persons of Mt Paektu as declared in the press statement of the International Preparatory Committee. 
					
					All the preparatory committees in the region will send their delegations to the Fifth International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu to be held in August and make contributions to the successful festival by raising voices of boundless reverence and praise for them.
					
					The Asia-Pacific Regional Preparatory Committee fully supports once again the appeal and press statement of the International Preparatory Committee and will give further momentum to the drive for praising the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu in close liaison with the preparatory committees in all regions and countries of the world.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al Presidente de Kirguizistan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al Presidente de Kirguizistan
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, remitio el dia 17 un mensaje de consuelo al presidente de la Republica de Kirguizistan, Almazbek Atambaev, con respecto a que murieron muchas personas y se destruyeron viviendas por la caida de un avion transportador de cargas. 
					En su misiva, el remitente expreso profundo pesar y consuelo al destinatario, a las victimas y sus familiares y deseo de todo corazon que se eliminen cuanto antes la tristeza de los familiares y las consecuencias del accidente.

articles.title: Se efectua la reunion conjunta de gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de la RPDC
articles.content:
Se efectua la reunion conjunta de gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 18 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la reunion conjunta del gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con el tema de cumplir las tareas por la reunificacion de la patria, presentadas por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en su mensaje del Ano Nuevo.
					A la cita asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yong Chol, Ro Tu Chol, el presidente del partido amigo, los funcionarios de las entidades de masas y sociales, asi como los representantes del gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de la RPDC, incluso los funcionarios del Comite Norteno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria y la Direccion Nortena de la Alianza Pannacional de Jovenes y Estudiantes por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APJERP).
					
					En la ocasion se discutio el tema "Para abrir en este ano significativo un ancho camino de la reunificacion independiente con la fuerza unida de toda la nacion en acato al historico mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un".
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del presidente del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria, Ri Son Gwon, e intervinieron el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, Kim Yong Dae, el primer secretario del CC de la Union de la Juventud, Jon Yong Nam, y el presidente del Consejo de Religiosos de Corea, Kang Ji Yong.
					
					Los oradores se refirieron a que en su mensaje del Ano Nuevo, el Maximo Dirigente llamo a abrir una ancha avenida hacia la reunificacion independiente con la fuerza unida de toda la nacion en este ano, en que se cumpliran 45 y 10 anos desde la publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio y de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, respectivamente, y enseno generalmente las tareas y remedios por el respecto.
					
					Subrayaron que la linea y orientacion en materia de reunificacion, presentadas por el Maximo Dirigente en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo, constituyen gran programa para cumplir la causa de reunificacion de la patria con la fuerza unida de toda la nacion, y las apoyaron absolutamente.
					
					Senalaron que al dar acicate a su gran marcha nacional hacia la reunificacion con su fuerza unida, todos los compatriotas del Norte, el Sur y ultramar deben obrar de una manera tal que pueda contribuir a que este sea un ano muy significativo que abra una nueva coyuntura de la reunificacion independiente.
					
					Al final, quedo aprobado un llamamiento a toda la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de RPDC exhortan a lograr reunificacion
articles.content:
Gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de RPDC exhortan a lograr reunificacion
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- El gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hicieron publico el dia 18 un llamamiento dirigido a toda la nacion coreana.
					El 2017 es un ano en que se cumpliran el 45o y 10o aniversarios de publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio y de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, respectivamente, subraya el llamamiento y continua:
					
					1. !Luchemos de modo activo para realizar la linea y politica en materia de la reunificacion independiente, llenas de patriotismo y amor a la nacion, guardando el orgullo y dignidad de la gran nacion de sol!
					
					!Abramos vigorosamente el camino de la reunificacion enarbolando en alto la bandera de la independencia nacional y la gran unidad!
					
					!Rechacemos tajantemente todos los ejercicios de guerra que destruyen la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana!
					
					!Apoyemos absolutamente a la reunificacion mediante la formula federal por encima de la diferencia de ideologia y regimen y luchemos activamente para su materializacion!
					
					2. !Despleguemos una gigantesca lucha para mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y eliminar de raiz el choque militar y el peligro de guerra entre ambas partes!
					
					!Frustremos resueltamente las maniobras de las autoridades surcoreanas de confrontar con la RPDC, causa principal de la congelacion de las relaciones Norte-Sur y ente canceroso para su mejora!
					
					!Dinamice toda la nacion coreana amante a la paz una gran lucha sagrada para atenuar el choque militar entre ambas partes coreanas y el peligro de guerra y establecer un sistema para la paz!
					
					!Respondan las autoridades surcoreanas a nuestros esfuerzos sinceros por prevenir el choque militar y aliviar el estado de tension entre el Norte y el Sur, en vez de acusar sin ton ni son nuestros ejercicios de autodefensa!
					
					!Pongan inmediato fin a sus imprudentes tentativas de aumento de las fuerzas armadas y sus ejercicios de guerra, que exacerban la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana!
					
					3. !Abramos la era de prosperidad de gran movimiento por la reunificacion al realizar sin falta una gran reunion de toda la nacion para la reunificacion!
					
					!Solidaricen y unan todos los coreanos residentes en el Norte, en el Sur y en ultramar bajo el principio de someter todos a la reunificacion de la patria, causa comun de la nacion!
					
					!Luchemos activamente por efectuar una gran reunion para la reunificacion de toda la nacion en que participen las autoridades, partidos politicos, entidades del Norte y Sur y todos los compatriotas dentro y fuera del pais!
					
					4. !Frustremos rotundamente el reto de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion del interior y exterior que navegan a contrapelo de la aspiracion de la reunificacion de la nacion!
					
					!Acabemos con la dominacion y la intervencion de Estados Unidos, que intenta realizar su estrategia de dominar a Asia y el Pacifico manteniendo ocupado siempre el Sur de Corea!
					
					!Eliminemos rotundamente a la banda de traidores a la patria y la nacion, bajo la antorcha justa, que sin siquiera distinguir al verdadero enemigo principal de la nacion, dedica el interes de la nacion a las fuerzas foraneas!
					
					!Estados Unidos, tome la resuelta determinacion de abandonar su anacronica politica de hostilidad a la RPDC viendo bien la fuerza poderosa de la RPDC y la corriente de la epoca!
					
					!Ponga inmediato fin a la conjura de meter cuna entre los coreanos tendentes a azuzar a los belicistas perdidos el respaldo del pueblo para continuar la division!
					
					!La sociedad internacional que aprecia la independencia y paz, alce la voz contra las maniobras de impedimento de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas lacayunas que obstaculizan la paz y reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana!
					
					El gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de la RPDC llaman reiterada y enfaticamente a toda la nacion coreana a levantarse a la lucha sagrada para glorificar el 2017 como un ano significativo para abrir la nueva era de la reunificacion independiente en acato al llamamiento de amor a la patria y a la nacion del gran hombre sin igual.

articles.title: ACNC comenta el cambio de nombre de nuevo partido de conservadores surcoreanos
articles.content:
ACNC comenta el cambio de nombre de nuevo partido de conservadores surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- La banda de conservadores titeres del Sur de Corea, empantanada ahora en la peor crisis, esta desesperada para realizar su ambicion de tomar el poder.
					Recientemente, la fraccion no partidaria de Park Geun-hye, que se ha derivado del "Partido Saenuri", fabrico una nueva agrupacion conservadora y la nombro como "Partido Parun".
					
					Este nombre, que significa la "justeza", no pasa de ser un engano para encubrir la naturaleza de los apartados del "Partido Saenuri" quienes habian servido fielmente a la traidora Park.
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos estan consternados ante los integrantes del "Nuevo Partido Reformista y Conservador" (ahora "Partido Parun") que siendo complices de Park, sacaron todos los provechos posibles y se separaron de ella.
					
					Son precisamente los jefes de la fraccion no partidaria de Park los que hicieron todo lo posible para la eleccion de la traidora como "presidenta".
					
					Cuando ocurrio el "escandalo politico Park Geun-hye - Choe Sun Sil", se ha desatado en el "Partido Saenuri" una pelea para imputar uno al otro las responsabilidades, al cabo de la cual aparecio el "Partido Parun".
					
					Para la retoma del poder por parte de los conservadores, los tipejos de ese partido alaban a Ban Ki-Moon, criticado como el igual a Park Geun-hye, diciendo que el ingresara en la organizacion y traera la "victoria".
					
					Lo mas intolerable es que ellos se burlan de la opinion publica diciendo que "los habitantes surcoreanos les esperan la politica limpia".
					
					Por su conducta bochornosa, la organizacion de ellos se gano apodos como "partido camaleon y taimado" y "grupo de egoistas y remanentes de la vieja politica".
					
					La poblacion surcoreana demanda unanimemente que no se repitan verguenza y calamidades mas grandes de la historia, sufridas por no haber eliminado consecuentemente a la descendiente del dictador "Yusin" y sus remanentes.
					
					El cambio del nombre del partido es una tragicomedia que anuncia el fin de los conservadores surcoreanos.
